posts.subject: zeroid fuks anonimity
posts.body: after a new installation, zeronet works perfectly. from the moment one get a zeroid, it fucks zeronet. nothing works anymore. it become slow an buggy. zites won't update. especially millchan. my opinion. once we get an id, we become trackable, no more anonymous, and if we say something that goes against zeronet purpose, we gets shadowbanned. the purpose of zeronet is to infect China, Russia and Iran with western political propaganda in order to weaken their  governments and turn the people against themselves, promoting riots with a false promise of liberty and human rights. the alternative, kxoid, does not work. in result, one cannot speak on the most advertised forum, which is zerotalk.
